name: Hazel
headline: AI-enabled procurement software for government
description: Hazel sells AI-powered procurement software to the 19,000+ local, state, and federal government entities which procure $2.7T a year. We use AI to write solicitations 10x faster and find 10x as many vendors, saving time and money

founders.name: August Chen, Founder
founders.description:
@Palantir, I built wildfire prevention apps that led to a 99% reduction in acres impacted by wildfires in CA. I also developed several channel partnerships from 0 ->1, securing $Xmm in high-margin licenses.

MechE/CS @ Harvard '20. Led MakeHarvard. My thesis was on how we can safely deploy aerosols into the stratosphere to save Earth (see: geoengineering).

founders.name: Elton Lossner, Founder
founders.description:
Originally from Atlanta, Elton graduated with a bachelor's in Electrical Engineering from Harvard, where he cofounded MakeHarvard and wrote an AI/ML thesis in medtech. He interned in data engineering for Capital One and aerospace engineering for a space startup.

He spent ~5 years at BCG, exiting as Project Leader. He built *lots* of slides and led strategy and procurement cases in the Aerospace & Defense and Public Sector practice areas. He lives in Boston with his wife.

# AI Procurement Software for 
Providing government procurement teams the tools to buy better and faster
[Request a Demo](https://hazelai.com/<#contact-us>)
![hazel hero image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/662982dae96aeb0e37e8c1e6/6633eddf4a5fc7a1941b0bbf_New%20file%20\(1\).gif)
**For Purchasing**
## Purchasing has never been easier.
We save you time on manual processes so you can focus more on strategically engaging vendors.
![tabs image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/662982dae96aeb0e37e8c1e6/6642710893705e2e9696f0a4_RFP%20Desciption.gif)
![tabs image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/662982dae96aeb0e37e8c1e6/6633dcf967bd912e9cc1036d_Hazel%20Home%2002.gif)
![tabs image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/662982dae96aeb0e37e8c1e6/662fd0b9482d2c461ba0e971_Hazel%2003.gif)
[![icon link tab hazel](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/662982dae96aeb0e37e8c1e6/662a60930cdc931874948d18_magic-wand-01.webp)Write solicitations with an AI copilotOur AI tools help draft your solicitation based on your requirements, reference documents, and similar contracts nationwide. Leverage best-in-class prior work and save time on web searches and copying from old Word documents.](https://hazelai.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[![tab link icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/662982dae96aeb0e37e8c1e6/662a6d3dc8936571e5ed2b42_tab2.webp)Automatically find suitable vendorsUse your solicitation to automatically identify local businesses which could be a strong fit. Draw from the latest commercial data and other verified data sources to get supplier information. Use our AI tools to automate drafting and delivery of tailored outreach messages.](https://hazelai.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[![icon tab hazel](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/662982dae96aeb0e37e8c1e6/662a6d3e24f9adfd3566eeee_tab3.webp)Gather purchasing intelligenceUnderstand the breadth and diversity of your local suppliers, including MWBE/SBE status and contract vehicles. Assess supplier risk and capabilities before you shape the requirements ‚Äì not after.](https://hazelai.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)
![tabs image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/662982dae96aeb0e37e8c1e6/6642710893705e2e9696f0a4_RFP%20Desciption.gif)
![icon link tab hazel](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/662982dae96aeb0e37e8c1e6/662a60930cdc931874948d18_magic-wand-01.webp)
### Copilot for writing your RFP
Our AI tools help draft your RFP based on your requirements and similar RFPs issued nationwide. Reuse existing documents so you can focus your time on procurement strategy and vendor selection, not searching for and copying outdated text.
![tabs image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/662982dae96aeb0e37e8c1e6/6633dcf967bd912e9cc1036d_Hazel%20Home%2002.gif)
![icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/662982dae96aeb0e37e8c1e6/662a6d3dc8936571e5ed2b42_tab2.webp)
### Understand and match potential vendors to contracts
Use your RFP to automatically identify local businesses which could be a strong fit for your needs. Draw from our database, MWBE registries, and your vendor list to get supplier contact information. Use our AI tools to automate drafting and sending customized outreach messages.
![tabs image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/662982dae96aeb0e37e8c1e6/662fd0b9482d2c461ba0e971_Hazel%2003.gif)
![icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/662982dae96aeb0e37e8c1e6/662a6d3e24f9adfd3566eeee_tab3.webp)
### Onboard Vendors in an Instant
Centralize all your onboarding and compliance documents into one place. Enforce standardized intake forms, export field data, and automate vendor compliance checks. No more email back-and-forth.
[ Pause Play ](https://hazelai.com/<#>)
[Request a Demo](https://hazelai.com/<#contact-us>)
**For Management**
## AI for every part of the government procurement mission.
Our platform uses AI and best-in-class, cloud-based software to manage all your agency‚Äôs procurement needs.
![businesses hazel card](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/662982dae96aeb0e37e8c1e6/662a8fec9789de55fa418597_icon%20card%20bus.webp)
### **Monitor vendor performance**
We help you track vendor performance in one place and rapidly generate user surveys for continuous review. No more surprises at the end of the contract on how they‚Äôre doing.
![businesses hazel card](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/662982dae96aeb0e37e8c1e6/662a8fecf10d625f6a3052b2_icon%20card%20bus%202.webp)
### **Support supplier diversity**
We match your solicitations to eligible diverse vendors and provide automatic outreach using our proprietary tools. Effortlessly offer tailored opportunities to eligible local businesses.
![businesses hazel card](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/662982dae96aeb0e37e8c1e6/662a8fec8faafc448128c3cd_icon%20card%20bus%203.webp)
### **Ensure compliance**
We check that your solicitation follows best practices and that your vendor is compliant. Have peace of mind that you‚Äôre issuing the right opportunities to the right vendors. 
[Request a Demo](https://hazelai.com/<#contact-us>)
About us
## Procurement software built by government and technology experts.
Hazel's team is led by engineers from world-class organizations solving mission-critical problems for government.
[Request a Demo](https://hazelai.com/<#contact-us>)
![hazel avatar](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/662982dae96aeb0e37e8c1e6/662a958eb8255156f4a1c862_Ellipse%20131.webp)

AI Policy
## AI for the public interest.
Delivering AI solutions for government means demanding the highest standards of integrity, transparency, and security from our software.
[Request a Demo](https://hazelai.com/<#contact-us>)
![image mobile ai policy](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/662982dae96aeb0e37e8c1e6/6633eef3cc84435b14528899_Frame%2048098438.webp)![hazel image al policy](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/662982dae96aeb0e37e8c1e6/6633eef4059be9e0c3492620_Frame%2048098439.webp)
Our customers can expect clear wireframes of what data and models we use, how we use them, and what their capabilities are. Hazel is included on the [GovAICoalition](https://hazelai.com/<https:/www.sanjoseca.gov/your-government/departments-offices/information-technology/ai-reviews-algorithm-register/govai-coalition>) vendor registry. We are JCP-certified, work only with U.S. government agencies, and build exclusively with U.S. citizens and U.S.-based tools.
[Request a Demo](https://hazelai.com/<#contact-us>)
Contact Us

generated_description:
### Overview of Hazel

**Name:** Hazel  
**Founded:** 2024  
**Location:** New York  
**Team Size:** 5 employees  
**Backed by:** Y Combinator (Batch W24)  
**Website:** [hazelai.com](https://hazelai.com)  

### Mission

Hazel's mission is to revolutionize government procurement with AI-enabled software, serving over 19,000 federal, state, and local government entities that collectively spend approximately $2.7 trillion annually. The platform aims to accelerate the procurement process, enabling government agencies to generate solicitations ten times faster and discover ten times as many vendors, ultimately saving time and money.

### Key Features

- **AI-Powered Solicitation:** Users can leverage Hazel‚Äôs AI tools to draft solicitations efficiently by utilizing reference documents and similar contracts.
  
- **Vendor Discovery:** Automatically identify suitable local vendors based on solicitation requirements through extensive databases of verified supplier information.
  
- **Performance Monitoring:** Track vendor performance, submit user surveys, and gather insights for better supplier management.
  
- **Diversity Support:** Facilitate outreach to diverse vendors, ensuring compliance with diversity mandates in public procurement.
  
- **Compliance Assurance:** Automate checks to ensure that solicitations adhere to best practices and compliance standards.

### Team 

The Hazel team blends expertise in government and technology, with co-founders August S. Chen (CEO) and Elton G. Lossner (COO) leading a capable group of engineers. Their backgrounds include work at renowned organizations like Palantir and Lockheed Martin, bringing a wealth of experience in delivering mission-critical solutions for government agencies.

### Future Focus

Hazel is committed to upholding the highest standards of integrity, transparency, and security in its AI solutions, with a keen focus on public interest. By being a part of the GovAICoalition vendor registry and prioritizing U.S. based methodologies, Hazel ensures that its tools are built for the unique challenges faced by government entities.

For anyone involved in government procurement looking to upgrade their processes with AI, Hazel seems poised to be a transformative partner. If you're intrigued, don‚Äôt hesitate to visit their [website for a demo](https://hazelai.com/#contact-us) and explore how they can help enhance your procurement strategies.
